page.title: 10A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: We have another break at 2.40, and then it's orchestra. I play the clarinet. At 4.00 we go home for a cup f tea and biscuits while we watch the T.V. "I think Whizz is on tonight" At 5.30 we have tea, usually a boiled egg and bread and butter or toast. At 6.00 we get ready for scouts which is at Berkswell at 7.30. When we get there, we have a game and then each separate patrol has a meeting at it's patrol box. One more game after this and then home to happily greet a drink of Hot chocolate and a nice comfy bed.(It is now about 10.00) My day lasts fourteen and a half hours. I have nine and a half hours sleep! Ian Page
